Symbol.Script_3D:
! 5-20 LPS Water Softener
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat IF useSysMat THEN operatorMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
! --- WATER SOFTENER --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT mineralTankPos, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT brineTankPos, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, mineralTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT mineralTankPos, 0, mineralTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT brineTankPos, 0, brineTankHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 23 THEN PRISM 4, 0.05, -mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 AND GLOB_CONTEXT <> 23 THEN ! Detailed
GOSUB 200
ADDx mineralTankPos GOSUB 200 DEL 1
ADDx brineTankPos PRISM_ 2, brineTankHeight, 0,0, 979, brineTankDiam/2,360,4079 DEL 1
MATERIAL operatorMaterial
dR = 0.04
CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 979, mineralTankDiam/2,360,4079
RESOL 12
ADD mineralTankDiam/2, valveDepth/2, ConPosZ_8 ROTx 90 PRISM_ 6, valveDepth, -mineralTankDiam/2,-valveHeight/2, 15, -mineralTankDiam/2, valveHeight/2, 15, valveWidth-dR, valveHeight/2, 79, valveWidth, valveHeight/2-dR, 1079, valveWidth, -valveHeight/2+dR, 79, valveWidth-dR, -valveHeight/2, 1079 DEL 2
CUTEND
GOSUB 100 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 AND GLOB_CONTEXT <> 23 THEN ! Simple
GOSUB 210
ADDx mineralTankPos GOSUB 210 DEL 1
ADDx brineTankPos PRISM_ 2, brineTankHeight, 0,0, 979, brineTankDiam/2,360,4079 DEL 1
MATERIAL operatorMaterial
CUTPOLYA 2,1,0, 0,0, 979, mineralTankDiam/2,360,4079
ADD mineralTankDiam/2, valveDepth/2, ConPosZ_8 ROTx 90 PRISM 4, valveDepth, -mineralTankDiam/2,-valveHeight/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, valveHeight/2, valveWidth, valveHeight/2, valveWidth, -valveHeight/2 DEL 2
CUTEND
GOSUB 100 ENDIF
DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 14, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 14, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 14, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 14, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConPosZ_5=ConPosZ_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConEdit_5 = 14, ConPosX_6=ConPosX_6, ConPosY_6=ConPosY_6, ConPosZ_6=ConPosZ_6, ConLength_6=ConLength_6, ConEdit_6 = 14, ConPosX_7=ConPosX_7, ConPosY_7=ConPosY_7, ConPosZ_7=ConPosZ_7, ConLength_7=ConLength_7, ConEdit_7 = 14, ConPosX_8=ConPosX_8, ConPosY_8=ConPosY_8, ConPosZ_8=ConPosZ_8, ConLength_8=ConLength_8, ConEdit_8 = 16 END
100: ! Upper Pipe
MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
R = MAX(0.06, 2*pR)
difiH = mineralTankHeight - brineTankHeight IF difiH > 0 THEN pipeH1 = 0.2 pipeH2 = difiH + 0.2 ELSE pipeH1 = 0.2 - difiH pipeH2 = 0.2 ENDIF
ADDz mineralTankHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, pipeH1, pR, 1 ADD pipeH1, 0,-R ROTy 90 ROTz 90 REVOLVE 2, 90, 1+2, 0, R, 901, pR, 360, 4001
ROTy 90 ROTz -90 ADDy -R REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, brineTankPos-2*R, pR, 1 DEL 8
ADD mineralTankPos, 0, mineralTankHeight+pipeH1+R ROTy 90 ARMC pR, pR, pipeH1+R, 0,0,90 DEL 2
ADD brineTankPos, 0, brineTankHeight ROTy -90 REVOLVE 2, 360, 1+2, 0, pR, 1, pipeH2, pR, 1 ADD pipeH2, 0,R ROTy 90 ROTz -90 REVOLVE 2, 90, 1+2, 0, R, 901, pR, 360, 4001 DEL 5 RETURN
200: RESOL 12 fZ = footH-0.05 FOR i=1 TO 4 ADD mineralTankDiam/3, 0, 0.05 CYLIND fZ/2, 0.04 ADDz fZ/2 CYLIND fZ/2, 0.06 DEL 2 ROTz 90 NEXT i DEL 4
dhX = mineralTankHeight-hX RESOL res ROTy -90 REVOLVE 5, 360, 1+2+16+32, footH, mineralTankDiam/2, 2, hX-0.03, mineralTankDiam/2, 2, hX, mineralTankDiam/2-0.03, 1, mineralTankHeight-dhX/4, 0.2*mineralTankDiam, 1, mineralTankHeight, 0.002, 1 ADDx hX-0.03 ROTy 90 MODEL WIRE CIRCLE mineralTankDiam/2 MODEL SOLID DEL 3 RETURN
210: RESOL 6 FOR i=1 TO 4 ADD mineralTankDiam/3, 0, 0.05 CYLIND footH-0.05, 0.04 DEL 1 ROTz 90 NEXT i DEL 4
RESOL res ROTy -90 REVOLVE 4, 360, 1+2+16+32, footH, mineralTankDiam/2, 2, hX, mineralTankDiam/2, 1, 0, 0, 901, mineralTankHeight, 0.002, 3001 ADDx hX ROTy 90 MODEL WIRE CIRCLE mineralTankDiam/2 MODEL SOLID DEL 3 RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
! 5-20 LPS Water Softener
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- WATER SOFTENER --- !
HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 mineralTankPos, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 brineTankPos, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT2 -mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, unID: unID=unID+1
IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN
POLY2_B 4, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, 1, -mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, 1, mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, mineralTankDiam/2, 1, mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2, -mineralTankDiam/2, 1
px = SQR((mineralTankDiam/2)^2 - (valveDepth/2)^2) dR = 0.03
POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, px, valveDepth/2, 1, mineralTankDiam/2+valveWidth-dR, valveDepth/2, 1, mineralTankDiam/2+valveWidth, valveDepth/2-dR, 1001, mineralTankDiam/2+valveWidth,-valveDepth/2+dR,1, mineralTankDiam/2+valveWidth-dR,-valveDepth/2,1001, px,-valveDepth/2, 0
POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 901, mineralTankDiam/2,360,4001
POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, mineralTankPos, 0, 901, mineralTankDiam/2,360,4001
ADD2 brineTankPos, 0 POLY2_B 2, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 901, brineTankDiam/2,360,4001 DEL 1
ENDIF ENDIF DEL TOP
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 1, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 1, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 1, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 1, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5, ConLength_5=ConLength_5, ConEdit_5 = 1, ConPosX_6=ConPosX_6, ConPosY_6=ConPosY_6, ConLength_6=ConLength_6, ConEdit_6 = 1, ConPosX_7=ConPosX_7, ConPosY_7=ConPosY_7, ConLength_7=ConLength_7, ConEdit_7 = 1, ConPosX_8=ConPosX_8, ConPosY_8=ConPosY_8, ConLength_8=ConLength_8, ConEdit_8 = 1 DEL 1
DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN
POLY2_B 5, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, pR/2, 1, brineTankPos+pR/2, pR/2, 1, brineTankPos+pR/2, -pR/2, 1001, 0, -pR/2, 1, 0, pR/2, 1001 ENDIF ENDIF
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! 5-20 LPS Water Softener
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
valveDepth = ABS(2 * ConPosY_8) valveHeight = 0.30 actD = 0.2 * mineralTankDiam ! Timer and Valve neck height
pR = ConWidth_3/2 ! Upper pipe diameter
footH = 0.15 * mineralTankHeight
IF mineralTankHeight > mineralTankDiam/2 THEN hX = SQR(mineralTankHeight^2 - (mineralTankDiam/2)^2) ELSE hX = mineralTankHeight ENDIF
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! 5-20 LPS Water Softener
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_str[2][2] ui_vis_str[1][1] = `Корпус` ui_vis_str[2][1] = `Панель Управления` ui_vis_str[1][2] = "MainBoxMaterial" ui_vis_str[2][2] = "operatorMaterial"
DIM ui_vis_attr[5][4] FOR i = 1 TO 5 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 0 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 0
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[8] FOR i = 1 TO 8 ui_con_type[i] = 0 NEXT i
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_str = ui_vis_str, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! 5-20 LPS Water Softener
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 2.2*mineralTankDiam+brineTankDiam/2 ! 1.5*mineralTankDiam+brineTankDiam/2 IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,]
minD = 0.20 IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,]
minH = 0.50 IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,]
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="B" THEN mineralTankDiam = B PARAMETERS mineralTankDiam=mineralTankDiam IF brineTankDiam>B THEN brineTankDiam=B PARAMETERS brineTankDiam=brineTankDiam
ConPosY_7=-brineTankDiam/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_7=ConPosY_7 ENDIF
ConPosY_1=-B/2 ConPosY_2=-B/2 ConPosY_4=-B/2 ConPosY_5=-B/2 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1,ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2,ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4,ConPosY_5=ConPosY_5 ELSE B = MAX(brineTankDiam, mineralTankDiam) PARAMETERS B = B ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "ZZYZX" THEN mineralTankHeight = ZZYZX - valveHeight PARAMETERS mineralTankHeight = mineralTankHeight ENDIF
IF brineTankHeight > mineralTankHeight THEN brineTankHeight = mineralTankHeight PARAMETERS brineTankHeight = mineralTankHeight ENDIF ENDIF
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minV = mineralTankDiam + 0.15 maxV = A-mineralTankDiam/2-brineTankDiam VALUES "mineralTankPos" RANGE[minV,maxV] IF mineralTankPos<minV THEN mineralTankPos=minV PARAMETERS mineralTankPos=minV ENDIF IF mineralTankPos>maxV THEN mineralTankPos=maxV PARAMETERS mineralTankPos=maxV ENDIF
minV = 0.2 VALUES "mineralTankDiam" RANGE [minV,] IF mineralTankDiam<minV THEN mineralTankDiam=minV PARAMETERS mineralTankDiam=minV ENDIF
minV = 0.5 maxV = ZZYZX VALUES "mineralTankHeight" RANGE[minV, maxV] IF mineralTankHeight<minV THEN mineralTankHeight=minV PARAMETERS mineralTankHeight=minV ENDIF IF mineralTankHeight>maxV THEN mineralTankHeight=maxV PARAMETERS mineralTankHeight=maxV ENDIF
minV = mineralTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2+brineTankDiam/2 + 0.15 VALUES "brineTankPos" RANGE[minV,] IF brineTankPos<minV THEN brineTankPos=minV PARAMETERS brineTankPos=minV ENDIF
minV = 0.2 VALUES "brineTankDiam" RANGE [minV,] IF brineTankDiam<minV THEN brineTankDiam=minV PARAMETERS brineTankDiam=minV ENDIF
minV = 0.5 maxV = ZZYZX VALUES "brineTankHeight" RANGE[minV, maxV] IF brineTankHeight<minV THEN brineTankHeight=minV PARAMETERS brineTankHeight=minV ENDIF IF brineTankHeight>maxV THEN brineTankHeight=maxV PARAMETERS brineTankHeight=maxV ENDIF
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="ZZYZX" THEN IF ConPosZ_5 > hX-0.03-ConWidth_5 THEN ConPosZ_5 = hX-0.03-ConWidth_5 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_5=ConPosZ_5 ENDIF IF ConPosZ_6 > hX-0.03-ConWidth_6 THEN ConPosZ_6 = hX-0.03-ConWidth_6 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_6=ConPosZ_6 ENDIF IF ConPosZ_7 > brineTankHeight-ConWidth_7/2 THEN ConPosZ_7 = brineTankHeight-ConWidth_7/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_7=ConPosZ_7 ENDIF IF ConPosZ_8 > hX-0.03-valveHeight/2 THEN ConPosZ_8 = hX-0.03-valveHeight/2 PARAMETERS ConPosZ_8=ConPosZ_8 ENDIF ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="A" THEN brineTankPos=A-brineTankDiam/2 PARAMETERS brineTankPos=brineTankPos ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="brineTankPos" THEN A=brineTankPos+mineralTankDiam/2+brineTankDiam/2 A=A PARAMETERS A=A,A=A ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="A" OR GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="mineralTankPos" THEN ConPosX_4=mineralTankPos ConPosX_5=mineralTankPos ConPosX_6=mineralTankPos-mineralTankDiam/2 PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosX_5=ConPosX_5, ConPosX_6=ConPosX_6 ENDIF IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="A" OR GLOB_MODPAR_NAME="brineTankPos" THEN ConPosX_7=brineTankPos PARAMETERS ConPosX_7=ConPosX_7 ENDIF
minZ = footH+ConWidth_1/2 maxZ = hX-0.03-ConWidth_1/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_1" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_1<minZ THEN ConPosZ_1=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_1>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_1=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1=maxZ ENDIF
minZ = footH+ConWidth_2/2 maxZ = hX-0.03-ConWidth_2/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_2" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_2<minZ THEN ConPosZ_2=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_2>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_2=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2=maxZ ENDIF
minZ = footH+ConWidth_3/2 maxZ = hX-0.03-ConWidth_3/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_3" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_3<minZ THEN ConPosZ_3=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_3>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_3=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3=maxZ ENDIF
minZ = footH+ConWidth_4/2 maxZ = hX-0.03-ConWidth_4/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_4" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_4<minZ THEN ConPosZ_4=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_4>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_4=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4=maxZ ENDIF
minZ = footH+ConWidth_5/2 maxZ = hX-0.03-ConWidth_5/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_5" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_5<minZ THEN ConPosZ_5=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_5=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_5>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_5=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_5=maxZ ENDIF
minZ = footH+ConWidth_6/2 maxZ = hX-0.03-ConWidth_6/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_6" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_6<minZ THEN ConPosZ_6=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_6=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_6>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_6=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_6=maxZ ENDIF
minZ = ConWidth_7/2 maxZ = brineTankHeight-ConWidth_7/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_7" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_7<minZ THEN ConPosZ_7=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_7=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_7>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_7=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_7=maxZ ENDIF
minZ = footH+valveHeight/2 maxZ = hX-0.03-valveHeight/2 VALUES "ConPosZ_8" RANGE[minZ, maxZ] IF ConPosZ_8<minZ THEN ConPosZ_8=minZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_8=minZ ENDIF IF ConPosZ_8>maxZ THEN ConPosZ_8=maxZ PARAMETERS ConPosZ_8=maxZ ENDIF
minX = mineralTankDiam/2+ConWidth_8/2 maxX = mineralTankDiam/2+valveWidth-ConWidth_8/2 VALUES "ConPosX_8" RANGE[minX, maxX] IF ConPosX_8<minX THEN ConPosX_8=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_8=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_8>maxX THEN ConPosX_8=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_8=maxX ENDIF ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 8
! --- CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы 1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(mineralTankHeight/2, mineralTankDiam/3)
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<EPS THEN ConWidth_1=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF
PARAMETERS ConPosX_1 = 0 PARAMETERS ConPosY_1 = -mineralTankDiam/2
VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0, ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- CONNECTION --- !
